title: Was a Phallus Purposely Added to the Artwork for ‘The Little Mermaid’ VHS Cover?
subtitle: Rumor has it a disgruntled Disney artist sought revenge on the company by drawing a castle spire in the shape of a male sex organ.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The cover of Disney's "The Little Mermaid" home video includes a phallus deliberately drawn by a disgruntled artist.
